title: Cataracte de Niagara
description: A copper engraving of Niagara Falls Cataracte de Niagara uncoloured and published in 1754
creator: Jacques Nicholas Bellin

title: Canada 1788
description: The map was prepared and published in Bonne's two volume Atlas Encyclopedique in Paris in 1788
creator: Rigobert Bonne

title: Carte de la Partie Septentrionale de la Mer du Sud
description: A map by Jacques Nicolas Bellin with engraver Louis-Andre Dupuis drafted in light of the voyages and discoveries of Captain James Cook in 1778 and 1779 with notations based on the drafts of Henry Roberts
creator: Jacques Nicholas Bellin

title: Planisphere suivant la Projection de Mercator 1780
description: Mercator projection of the world in 1780 not taking into account recent explorations of the Pacific and originally published in Guillaume Raynal's Atlas de Toutes les Parties Connues du Globe Terrestres Dresse pour l'Histoire Philosophique et Politique des Etablissemens et du Commerce des Europeens dans les Deux Indes
creator: Rigobert Bonne
